advices.advice: If you get cramps, merely pull your big toe up as much as possible
Avoid lifting or moving heavy objects
Keep up the light physical exercises
If you experience discomfort when sleeping, experiment with pillows
Make a list of necessities for the newborn, this can be distributed to family and friends and can act as a guideline when buying gifts
Update your pregnancy diary, focusing on your mood, feelings, and daily health
With your baby, play sounds of nature: singing birds, ocean sounds, rain, and so on
